name: Catapult Punishment!
description:
Found guilty of treason, spying, fraud, tax-evasion, insider trading, racketeering, piloting a space craft under-the-influence, butt chugging and improper use of a balloon animal - Sam Handwich has been sentenced to PUNISHMENT by CATAPULT!

Smack Birds, Get Blown-Up, Level Up Skills and, most importantly, Serve Justice in Catapult Punishment!
